name: Steven Grant
text:
They do not have a local contact number. You have to call into the birmingham office to schedule or speak to anyone. If you want to speak to your actual doctor, all they do is put a note in your file for a nurse to call you back....which they never do.

I've called multiple times trying to get ahold of someone local and have had no luck. Now they just put me on hold and it just takes me to a voicemail, which I've left a message and have yet to hear anything back.

name: Susan Knudson
text: Scheduled appt for complete body screening. I was told appointment would be with  Dr. Pflederer, June 15 when I scheduled. I researched her. and was pleased.  She isn't even on site anymore.   I haven't been checked in 10+ years, I am 61 and spent many younger years basking in the sun. I have several places on my skin I've been concerned about, I don't know what to look for  and many of my friends have had skin cancer. I expressed my concerns when I scheduled my appt.  My complete exam was a NP, her appts are scheduled every 10 mins. No doc. I never was on exam table, she didn't look at my face, I didn't take glasses off. She was in a hurry, I ask for places to be removed. I was afraid of them being frozen off.  She said that that is all they could do and she wasn't sure ins covered it. I ask if they could call to check insurance, the reply was, "I don't think so"  I was charged for Office Visit $130 - $86.25 to freeze 3 places that are still there. $130 for 10 min exam. My dog gets more attention at his vet visits for $52.50.  If you want a complete exam, and I stressed that when I called,  I do not recommend this practice.  10 mins for a complete body exam, a nurse running out the door for her next patient, no info on what to check or look for and though insurance did pay for visit I am out $32.24.and I feel I need to be checked again. I will check with Fed BCBS to see exactly what kind of office visit I was suppose to get, code for time seen .....Not happy and will find a dermatologist practice that will act somewhat concerned and look out for my future health.

name: April 504
text:

I waited for my patient 3 hours in a peaceful surroundings

name: Del Chick
text:
The doctor at the Montgomery location is fantastic, the receptionist is very friendly , the office is beautiful...but the Drs assistant is a little arrogant.  She calls in prescriptions where SHE wants to and NOT where you ask her to.  So you end up going to the wrong drug store. You BETTER just hand carry your own prescription and NOT let her handle it.  At least she called me and told me SHE decided on her own where to send it, confessing she ignored me !
Needless to say I was infuriated, especially  because the patient is my very senior mother, and she had to wait patiently in the car while all this fiasco was going on!

name: Dena Yoder
text: The visit was great but I was prescribed 2 medications that even with my insurance were $65 each. When I called the office to ask for any alternatives that were less expensive, I was able to get 2 prescriptions from Walgreens that combined were $12 total. I wish to begin with the office would have reviewed and prescribed the more reasonably cost medication. It makes me feel like it’s in the best interest of the practice to use certain name medications which benefits them vs lower cost alternatives which benefit the patient.

resp.text: Hi Dena! Patient health and well-being is of top priority for us. Choosing prescription medications is a difficult job that doctors train years to master. Unfortunately, each patient has a specific insurance plan, with varying degrees of drug coverage. Knowing each patient’s insurance drug coverage is impossible, so our providers tell every patient to contact us if the prescribed medications aren’t covered well by their insurance plan and turn out to be too costly. This gives our providers the opportunity to come up with a new prescription plan that is less costly but still effective to treat you. We strive every day to give our patients the best treatment at the best possible price. If you’re up for it, we would love to speak with you on the phone about how the prescription process works on our end. Please contact us at 205.995.5575 and we will be happy to talk through your concerns. We hope to talk to you soon!

name: Caroline Moore
text: I am so impressed by Reveal Beauty.  I had always been reluctant to go into a plastic surgeon’s office, unsure of what to expect. I am in my late 50’s and I didn’t think it was something I would ever do. However, after hearing recommendations from friends I decided to give it a try. I am so glad that I did! From the moment you walk in the door you are greeted with professionalism and friendliness. It is such a serene and easy experience. I went in for a consult with Dr. Clinton and was so impressed. He is a great listener and spent so much time with me. He listened to my concerns and what I wanted to address then offered solutions ranging from surgery to less intrusive options. One of the things I like best about this office is the absence of pressure to do anything that you may not feel comfortable with or ready for. Their office policy is truly reflected in their name “Reveal Beauty”.  The doctors emphasize enhancing your individual beauty, with the objective of achieving a relaxed more youthful look rather than an overdone look. I underwent the C02 laser treatment and the results are amazing! So worth it! In addition to the professionalism and competence of the doctors, the staff is so friendly, kind, patient and helpful. I especially appreciated their follow up after my procedure. They are all so focused on the patient’s wishes and comfort during consult and treatment. I was so impressed that I will be returning for a bleph.

I highly recommend Dr. Pearce and will definitely be seeing him in the future for Botox and touch up filler! Wonderful experience!

name: Brandy Erickson
text:
Dr Pearce and the amazing staff at Reveal Beauty made this a no brainer! From beginning to end I have felt comfortable with the decision I made to undergo a tummy tuck. I have had scars across my abdomen from pyloric stenosis & an appendectomy. Unfortunately, I have also had no ability to get a six pack, no matter how hard I worked out nor how thin I was...this was a favorite benefit of the surgery as Dr Pearce fixed my abdominal muscles so they’re United, I have the ability to actually use and feel my abdominal muscles! The care, patience & thoughtfulness I received while under Dr Pearce’s care was unlike any other! I highly recommend anyone interested in having “you’re best You” going forward, check out Revealing Beauty! You will absolutely be impressed with them & your new You!!!!
PS
There are some amazing side effects of this bright new YOU.... you’re going to love your results so much that you’re likely to be dedicating much of your time to fitness, which is going to force you outta the coronavirus depression & into a vibrancy & inner confidence that is an extraordinary bonus!! Hello Healthy, Happy, New You!!! 😍🥰😍

name: Lauren Nathanson
text: Dr. Ben Pearce did a fantastic job in aiding me on my journey of  becoming more comfortable in my own skin with his treatment. He has excellent bedside manner and is genuinely kind. One of my favorite things about Dr. Pearce is his honesty. I went in wanting two treatments, and he was open about me only needing one and not both. He was able to kindly and gently offer suggestions about products or treatment I may need or from which I would benefit the most. I could not have been happier with my choice of doctor.

name: Jack Burnette
text: Dr. Clinton and Dr. Pearce are wonderful to work with and I am very pleased with the procedures I have had done to improve my self image. All of the staff are wonderful to work with as well.

name: Malcolm Bonds
text: I was impressed with Dr. Pearce from the moment I met him. He's very caring and attentive.  He said something at my initial visit with him that really made me decide it was he that I wanted to do my surgery.  He said, "I like doing surgery, but."  The "but," was in reference to the procedure I wanted him to preform, with some doubt if the surgery would achieve what I wanted.  I really appreciated his honesty. So I agreed, regardless of the outcome, because I didn't like looking my  turkey neck. I was more than satisfied.  I was so happy to see my new look.  I think of him everyday when I look in the mirror.  As well as being more than satisfied with his work, I enjoyed his bedside manner.  He was fun to get to know.  I can't say enough good things about his work and his personality.  I am forever grateful.

name: Jenah Connell
text: I am so pleased with my experience! I love Dr. Pearce!! Highly recommend!

name: Lindsey Kurnick
text: I have had the best possible experience with Dr. Pearce. From the moment I made my consultation the service was first class and he made me feel incredibly important. Each time I walked in the door I was greeted by name and seen rather promptly. I had a full tummy tuck, breast lift and Lipo off my lower back. Just as anyone else my end result was really important to me and Dr. Pearce went above and beyond, he didn’t leave me with a narrow straight up and down body that I see so often with TT, he made sure I had a nice hour glass shape, he worked some serious magic with my breasts also, they don’t look like I’ve breast fed 3 kids at all. Dr. Pearce listened and understood my lifestyle and I could not be any happier with my results. I am so glad he is whom I trusted to do my procedure. I truly cannot say enough good things about him as a surgeon. After consulting with several surgeons there is no doubt that Dr. Pearce was the absolute right choice. Thank you so much for giving me my confidence back.

name: Jamie Loyd
text: I’ve been wanting lip fillers for a long time and I finally got the courage to do it.. Dr Pearce made me feel super comfortable with my decision and did an amazing job. I’m super happy with the results!

name: corey hooks
text: Staff is always so helpful and friendly. Nice, clean office and rooms.

name: Lorrie Lawson
text: Everyone here is so friendly and professional. I wish all clinics had to set their standards after this one

name: Sarah Singleton
text: I recently had a surgical procedure with Dr. Pearce. He was amazing to work with. He was patient with when I had so many questions about what I wanted to have done. He was honest and helpful in making my decision for what I needed and wanted. I was absolutely amazed at my results. I couldn’t have picked a better surgeon.

name: Tannas Knox
text: I had a Mommy Makeover 8 weeks ago and I am very pleased with the work Dr. Pearce did.  He had great bedside manners and was a professional at all time.  My results are wonderful!  (Full tummy tuck with breast lift and implants).

name: Sarah Raines
text: Dr. Pearce gave me fantastic Botox! In fact it’s because of him that now I’m hooked! Thank you Dr. Pearce! Not only did it get rid of my wrinkles, it made my self confidence about getting older so much better! Highly recommend!

name: Saray Jimenez
text: Great service! Wonderful pleople!

name: Heather Wills
text: Dr. Pearce was simply fantastic to work with. He listened carefully to what my goals were and he explained carefully how we were going to get there. Throughout entire process (from consultation through post operative visits) Dr. Pearce was very responsive. I am thrilled with the results of my bleph and eyebrow lift

name: rm martin
text: Over 20 years ago, I had a breast reduction and have never been happy with results...scarring was horrible  and the left side significantly larger. I consulted Dr. Pearce for a scar revision and breast lift. He took the time to really listen to my concerns and ensured that we were agreement about how to correct my issues while still getting a desired result. I am truly amazed and thrilled with the results! My breasts are symmetrical, the scars are now clean and match on both breasts, and they are so perky! Dr. Pearce made himself available to me for any post-op questions or concerns via text or email, even after hours. He is very pleasant and friendly. I highly recommend him for any procedure!

name: kimberly hockett
text: I have had such a great result  from my surgery with Dr. Pearce. He is so professional and patient with answering your questions. I had liposuction done abdominoplasty and also my breasts done and I must say I do look amazing .I want to thank him for all the work that he's done for me. He's a great surgeon.

name: Morgan Hepburn
text: Dr. Pearce repaired my earlobes after I had gauges. He did a wonderful job. It was a painless experience, and I’m without scars. Dr. Pearce is attentive to his patients and listens to their needs. I highly recommend his work.

name: Marc Stowe
text: I had a facelift, neck lift, facial fat transfer and blepharoplasty done by Dr. Ben Pearce, and I could not have had a better experience.  This talented young doctor and I were on the same page from day one as to what results I should expect.....he's extremely personable, and I was very comfortable and at ease at every step of the process.  I have had so many compliments on Dr. Ben's work, and if I ever want anything else done, he is the only surgeon that I will consider.

text: The operation was performed and we injected fat. As for the back fat sculpting, the result was negative, as the area was not sculpted.  As for the waist, one more area was carved than the other for fat injection, so the result was not very satisfactory.

name: karin mayes
text: Dr Pearce is really great. Takes time with patients and my results were the best. I highly recommend.

Overall great experience for me and will be recommending people in the future if they are looking for a plastic surgeon in the Birmingham area

text: I cannot say enough good things about Dr. Pearce and his bedside manner. I have had 2 rounds of plastics with him. After losing 100+ pounds I needed a complete overhaul and Dr. Pearce delivered. Dr. Pearce answered every question and concern I had throughout the process. I could not be more pleased with my results and the surgeon I chose.

text: I can not say enough good things about Dr. Michael Clinton and his staff. He made me feel so comfortable during my consultation. text: Dr. Pearce performed my surgery TT,MR, explant/implant , lipo to face and neck , arms , and flanks, and inner and outer thigh area . I am elated  with my results . He is an amazing doctor. text: I absolutely love Dr Clinton and his staff! So warm yet professional.  This was my 2nd breast reduction and I could not be more pleased!! I had very little pain and had no problems reaching someone when I had questions or concerns. I recommend on the highest level!!!

I trusted him completely to do the best job and he did! I am thrilled with my results and he always made me feel comfortable. The office staff knows you on a first name basis and worked with me so much to make it all possible! Thank you all so much!!

text: Dr. Clinton and his staff are incredible!  They treat you like you're part of the family.  I was so impressed by the professionalism and overall care they provide. name: Meredith Stutts
text: From consultation to post surgery follow up Dr. Clinton and his staff were amazing. My only regret is that I didn't do the surgery years ago. I would highly recommend Dr. Clinton. If you are questioning surgery go for a consultant and you will not regret it.

text: I had upper and lower eyelids,  lower facelift and Pixel treatment on Dec 4. Could not ask for better care. Recently went back for more filler around my nose and mouth, quick and relatively painless!

name: Leah Carmichael
text: I saw Dr. Clinton several times for various non-surgical procedures over a period of years. I went to  another doctor to save money once and came right back to Dr. Clinton. Even though he isn't the cheapest place in town, I felt his expertise was worth the extra cost. However, the last time I was in his office the staff was extremely rude. He instructed me to call anytime with questions about the products I purchased. When I did his assistant refused to come to the phone. She told the receptionist that I needed to schedule an appointment if I had any questions. I made a comment to the receptionist that I could purchase products from another doctor if they weren't willing to support me. She told me not to get defensive. Considering I've spent thousands of dollars with the practice I expected to be treated with more respect. It's unfortunate that I will have to find another doctor with the same good qualities as Dr. Clinton, but I refuse to put up with snobbish office staff.

name: Misty Doles-Busic
text: Dr Clinton and his staff have always been so accommodating and compassionate. I always feel relaxed knowing that I'm taken care of when I'm in their hands. I would recommend Dr Clinton to anyone!

name: Vicki Grey
text: The staff and doctor were very informative, friendly and honest. After leaving my appointment, I was very satisfied and knew that I did not need to look any further. I found the doctor for my surgery. I feel at ease and confident about choosing Xlinton Plastic Surgery.

name: Darma Whitmire
text:
I saw a resident who was very nice. When she brought in the doctor that she works under,   later in the visit, I was dumbfounded at the doctor ‘s lack of professionalism. She entered the room all smiles and told me that she was the best around at what she did. When I tried to ask questions she immediately turned into a very sarcastic, condescending woman and said if I didn’t like what she had to say that there are other doctors that can help me and that she had just told another patient the same thing  that morning. This woman needs to retire because her bedside manner was repulsive. It disturbs me that someone like this person is mentoring our future doctors with her shockingly dreadful attitude. She was two  completely different people in less than a minute’s time. I believe that she is the one who needs to find a doctor that can help her.
I want to reiterate that the resident was very professional and kind.

name: Jody Williams
text: This place is a prescription factory.  I saw three doctors over two appointments.  After a very long wait both times, none of them had any interest in determining what type of skin I had, what sort of issues may be causing the problem, or the effectiveness of their treatments.  They just looked at the problem area and said "take this, this, this and schedule another appointment in 3 months" and sent me on my way.

name: Sandra Koulourides
text: I am almost 50 years old and my skin has never looked this good.  I look rested and 10 years younger thanks to Dr. Northington.  She knows how to get skin looking it's best.  I would not trust anyone else with my skin!

name: Rebekah Fitts
text: Dr. Northington is fellowship trained in cosmetic dermatology and has extensive experience doing all sorts of treatments and knows how to help you figure out the best treatment for what you are looking to do, whether it is get rid of wrinkles, dark spots or fat.  She is always so nice and accommodating and is just the BEST!

name: Amanda James
text: I have been seeing Dr. Northington for years for my acne and scarring. She makes you feel comfortable as soon as she walks into the room like you're talking to a friend instead of just your doctor. She genuinely cares about her patients' overall health as well as their dermatological health. Before starting any treatments, she has always discussed all the aspects and side affects. Based on these discussions, we've determined some more common methods were not right for me and suggested other options. When I was a teenager, she helped me decide on the best topical treatments, antibiotics, and ways to use them comfortably without drying out my face. When I grew older, she helped me decide on the best treatment for my scars and virtually erased the acne scarring I've had for over 10 years. You would never be able to guess today that I have been dealing with consistant acne since I was 12 years old. During any treatments I've had in the office, she made every effort to make sure I was comfortable and reduce as much pain as possible. I have referred many friends to Dr. Northington for things such as extreme dandruff, wart removal, and acne. Some have even driven over 80 miles just to be seen by her. Every person I've referred comes away a fan.

name: Mary Thacker
text: Did not seem interested in finding out what is wrong with my skin. No help at all.

text:
I have been a patient for many years and very happy with the care and family like community.

Dr Walker always is loving and listens carefully to what I have on my mind. Plus she is a Julia Roberts double. I see her two times per year and at times, she has even seen my granddaughters as patients.

Stacey Barton is an excellent Lazer Professional and is always wanting to learn the latest techniques for her patients. TruSculpt is her latest tool. I trust her with my needs and even those of my granddaughters.

Always willing to serve as a positive reference for this practice.

name: Melinda Corder
text: Great office!

resp.text: Your 5-star review is appreciated!

name: Leigh Horton
text: THE BEST!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star rating.  We appreciate it!

name: Crissy L.
text:
I have been a patient at Alabama Dermatology for over 20 years. I have seen several doctors over the years. I can only say good things about every one of them. The front office is always clean & orderly. The staff have always been friendly & professional.

Today was my 1st visit with CRNP, Alicia Holloway. I was greeted by Mrs. Holloway with a smile. She took the time to answer all my questions. Mrs. Holloway was very professional yet made me feel comfortable.

She didn’t push products or services in a way that made me feel like just a number. She made suggestions based on my concerns. I’m not sure how long she has been with the practice but I believe she is a great addition.  I will be back to see her & will definitely refer friends and family.

name: Paola Araque
text: Dr. Bentley and the CRNP were both really kind and attentive to my questions. My appointment was at 9:30. I arrived 30 minutes early and got seen 5 minutes earlier than my appointment time. The front desk staff were great! I was out in less than an hour. I would definitely recommend Alabama Derm.

name: Chris C
text: I will definitely be going here for any future checkups. They are very professional, knowledgeable and friendly. I saw a few bad reviews but they did not match the experience I had at all. Nothing but good things to say!

name: Susan Chambers
text: Average wait is an hour and a half. Receptionist is Extraordinarily rude. Always rude. She shouldn't engage with the public. Of course, the dermatology clinic is the only game in town so I can't imagine the clinic cares one twit. One nurse was spectacularly rude and slammed the door in my and son's face after reluctantly dragging us to light therapy (for which we waited an hour to get in). The clinic is overwhelmed, badly managed and appointment times so far out that patient just gives up or dies. The One positive part of this place is Dr. Walker and her nurse, Michele. They are both  beautiful, inside and out, caring, professional and know their stuff. I pray Dr. Walker and Michelle would split off from the clinic and form their own practice. I know a lot of people who would follow them in a heartbeat. I'm sorry I'm so rude but customers should know.

name: Brook Shirley
text: Dr. Weeks and his nurses have always been wonderful to me. He listens to what I have to say, and never rushes me. I cannot believe all of the negative reviews on here. Some people just won’t ever be happy with anything. Great job AL Derm!

name: Jason McNeil
text: Excellent Service. I was running late but they handled everything properly the same as they do every time I see them.

name: Gary Tate
text: Great doctors and very friendly staff. Wait times are very minimal 👍

name: Julie Burroughs
text: I have been very, very satisfied with the care provided by Dr. Lucas, Dr. Walsh, and their staff.  They have  been so kind, respectful, and attentive during my visits.  I have referred numerous people to this practice and they have ALL called me following their visit to say that how pleased they were with their office experience.

name: Deb S
text: Every person working this morning was very kind and professional.  My appoint was 9:15 am and my wait was less than 20 min... I don't see what everyone was complaining about in the other postings. I had no issues and no complaints. Well done employees, Dr Lucas and her nurse.

name: Ginger Bailey
text: Such a well run office! Dr.Walsh and her staff are amazing! I was concerned about the removal of my SCC so close to my eye, Dr. Walsh was extremely maticulous and thorough!!! Very compassionate group of people, thanks for such a pleasant experience!!!

name: Taylor Stephens
text: There are a lot of bad reviews on here, but my experience was excellent. First off, there is a major shortage in dermatology offices in Tuscaloosa which is why it takes so long to get an appointment and it's always backed up when you go. Its not an individual business issue; it's a market issue. That said, this business has handled high volume pretty well from my experience. Everyone from the employees in the front to the doctor that saw me were helpful and pleasant. I hope if you are making a decision on where to go, that you take this office into consideration.

name: Edward Todd
text: Attentive and caring staff, and Dr. Weeks was wonderful. Patiently listened to all I had to say and answered all my questions. Not rushed at all.

name: Forrest Wright
text: I came here a few years ago and saw a nurse practitioner named Emily Watson for eczema. I had heard that some types of food can cause eczema, so I asked her if this was true, using acidic foods as an example. She told me there was no way my eczema could be caused by a food and said that when black people have eczema it’s white and looks like acid on their skin so that’s probably where I heard this. I’m shocked and appalled that a medical professional would think that was an appropriate thing to say to a patient. She prescribed steroid creams that cost hundreds of dollars, even with insurance. Turns out my eczema was caused by dairy. How is it possible that someone could be so ignorant? You’d be better off driving to Birmingham and spending your money on a real dermatologist.

name: Ally Cox
text: Terrible. Waited an hour and 20 minutes was never called back. I got my money back and walked out. They don't care and don't think your time is valuable. The lady at the front told me there was no where else for me to go. Would not recommend

name: Terri Mayes
text: Did not appreciate to be told , "we're not taking new patients." I'm sure majority of the patients do not have to come back year after year for small issues such as mines and I think they need to find out what the issue is first. No one cares to be turned around when they're  in need of finding  someone to help them.

name: Kirk Walter
text: I had an appointment to see Dr. Lucas at 9:30 this morning - at 10:15 I still had not been called back to an examination room.  While this type of disrespect might be excusable for other types of doctors, those that must respond to patient emergencies, this is not the case for dermatologists.  A wait like this is only understood in the context of poor office management.  If this practice cares so little for their patients' time, I'd hate to guess how much they care about their health.

name: John LaGrone
text: Affordable Decks  good care takes time

name: Kiki Sum Serious
text: Dr.Staci Hardwick is so nice nd friendly. Whoever said dhat she’s rude u r a damn lie!!! She hlp mi baby out a lot nd I thank her 4 dhat!!!!

name: Gary Rogers
text: I was scheduled to see Staci Hardwick, CRNP.  After waiting over an hour, she comes into the patient room and makes a light hearted apology for being behind schedule.  I made a statement asking if this was normal procedure being behind.  She said most often yes it was.  I told her that was a shabby way to run a business because it seems like they are always an hour or more behind schedule.  Ms. Hardwick told me that if I didn't like the fact she ran behind because she was taking care of patients with worse needs than mine (I was there for a follow-up to a Blue Light treatment) that I should find a new dermatologist.  I told her that she was right.  I got up put on my coat and left.  I absolutely do not want this woman to practice medicine on me when she has this kind of attitude.  She needs to learn proper family care methods.

name: Jamie Hodo
text: there staff is so rude and doesnt understand people's feelings  and rather just reject service poor professional skills.

name: Teresa Atchenson
text: Dr.Griffiths was nice.He treated my husband.Every on was nice that day.

name: Deondrea Taylor
text: I have been a patient with them for years , and today I called to schedule a appointment & the lady tells me your not in our records on file , I said how when I been there several of times and you guys done wrote me prescriptions and everything and she tells me well you aren't or have never been here because we have files dating back from our old location we argue back and forth and I keep telling her well I am a patient there so  . Then she keep saying we aren't accepting new patients  I'm not a new patient I done been there before I could tell her my doctor name and everything she still wasn't listening ... How can you tell someone they haven't been a patient somewhere ? When they clearly know they have ! She very was rude . So she switched over to another lady who as soon as she got on the phone asked me the same questions , and I asked so did you find my file and she said yes ... df ? I didn't even wanna make an appointment after that ! Never had a bad experience with them until now ... Lets see how it goes when I show up for my appointment .

Stacy Barton always does a great job, gives good advice for skincare and is most pleasant during the procedure.   She is professional and a joy!

Linda Dunn

name: Richard J Haberstroh (Rick Haberstroh)
text:
Seeing Dr. Scarlette Smith, is a great blessing to me, especially given my family history of serious skin cancer and my own hard headedness during my earlier years. Knowing as my physical body ages - Dr. Smith has and continues to be thoughtful, thorough - (today I had a complete body examination) intentional, and has helped me to feel at ease in our conversation. I may Suffer from undiagnosed, “white coat PTSD,” LOL, that I am even at times able to recall if I’ve noticed any area of my skin which might be of even a minor concern to me. Just from knowing myself - I recognize when I’m relaxed I’m more likely to have the capacity for recalling those kinds of details when I feel at ease, and in a safe place. It’s at those times we are both able to be completely focused On being thorough and on my general well-being.bThese days in the world of medicine my experience has been that this type of atmosphere is more and more difficult to find.

I feel confident with each visit dr. Smith and her staff have my best interest, from a medical health perspective - at heart. On those occasions I have asked about ways of improving the overall health and condition of my skin - the products recommended have been available over the counter. I’d also note that the items I purchased based on her recommendation, generally sit right next to the ones I had been using but generally had found ineffective. I have found her product recommendations consistently are the products I ultimately have been sticking with for a long time now. So yes, I am able to recommend, Dr. Smith and the dermatology and skin care Center without hesitation.

name: Kathryn Leopard
text: Love love love Dr. Smith!! She’s an excellent doctor and has the best bedside manner. Dr. Smith never makes me feel rushed or embarrassed and she answers all of my questions. Cannot say enough good things about her! Everyone in the office in general has been super nice & professional. Highly recommend!

name: Sc German
text: Wonderful facility and staff. I saw Dr. Scarlett Smith, and she helped me create an all-inclusive approach to treating me cystic acne. Within 2 months, the progress was incredible! Highly recommend!

name: Jacqueline Dorris
text: First impression of the office was that it was very modern & clean which is something I look for! I saw the NP Katie Tuck today as a new patient and was very impressed! She was so nice and explained everything very thoroughly. I felt comfortable through my full exam and even during some small procedures. I would 100% recommend (and already have) to friends/family.

name: Haider Mahmood
text: Had a wonderful experience at this clinic. Very professional atmosphere and Julie stayed in the room and answered all our questions and stayed OFF the iPad the entire time. At other clinics the doctor stays on the iPad and it's very "get in, get out, go home" experience. Love this place. Highly recommended.

text: Dr. Harper, Katie and Becky are all smart, caring and thorough health care providers who work hard to give their patients the best care. Everyone in the office works to make the experience quick, efficient and helpful!

text: The center always keeps the appointments on time and you don’t have to sit and wait for along time.  Those working with the center are always nice and professional.  I couldn’t ask for a better treatment center.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Kal El
text: My first visit I had to explain everything three times.   Once to each one of his two Physician's Assistants then a third time to the doctor.   After asking me questions about my condition he coldly stated he needed to do a biopsy to determine my issue.   I was never given any option for treatment, no tests or anything just the option to cut on me.  After paying for that I got the results and it was psoriasis.   It took a biopsy for  this "dermatologist" to inform me that I had psoriasis on my skin.  I was thinking to myself, has this doctor never seen psoriasis before?   My final appointment I had issues about skin on a different part of my body which was the original reason I was referred to him.  He pretty much told me the condition was because of my age and there was nothing he could do for me, then he mentioned I could have another biopsy done.  The doctor talked "at me" instead of to me and kept cutting me off when I was trying to convey my concerns.  This was the worst doctor's visit I have had in a while and I left there feeling worse than when I went in.  Horrible experience!!!!!

name: Billy Greene
text: A family member contracted a contagious infection while visiting family out of state, and brought it back with them. I have taken them multiple times to the office and followed treatment protocol. However, they still have concerning spots. I brought them in and was met with animosity from the Dr..The nurse is very nice and seems caring. However, his accusitory tone and demeaningly telling me I was wrong in going above and beyond to try get rid of these things in front of my child was uncalled for.  I have spent hours and hours cleaning and sanitizing my home even though it was contacted elsewhere. I've been vacuuming sweeping and mopping a 5000 sqft home daily, along with spraying sterifab and permitherin,  washing  every piece of clothing  and bedding on hot and high heat, and then following the treatment regiment prescribed. I have called several exterminators and they have said that this condition is normally not treated with home fumigation due to the short life span of the mite away from host. I was made to feel as though I had not done my due diligence to get rid of the situation because I had not had the home professionally fumigated. I'm embarrassed and appalled by the whole situation.

resp.text:
Patient feedback is very important to us. Please know that we only have the best interest at heart for our patients and their families. It is our job to provide the most appropriate advice for each individual situation. While each encounter may be different, oftentimes our advice remains the same despite repeat visits by a patient to our office. In many cases several visits may be necessary to effectively treat a condition. Our providers are well trained to diagnose and treat various dermatological conditions. Patients receiving advice from people not trained in the medical field is generally not recommended.

Our intentions are never to upset patients but to help them. Any patient who is dissatisfied with their service is welcome to schedule a meeting to discuss further treatment or to find a resolution for a specific condition. Kind regards.

name: Carolynn Pate
text: The staff here are very professional and so nice to you. They care about you.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: C. Kenneth Tanner
text: Competent personnel and excellent physician. Significant attention to detail. Friendly and a clear focus on the wellbeing of the patient.

resp.text: You're great!

name: Al McNeill
text:
Me and my wife went to this place. First the full body check was a joke. Me and my wife both had one.
I had a colored spot removed which was done by the CNP while the doctor just watched. I have never heard of that being done while the doctor was there and just watched. Don't go here if you want the doctor himself to do anything.

resp.text: We are very sorry that you and your wife were dissatisfied  with your visit. We work very hard to ensure our patients are taken care of to the highest quality of care. Our medical staff is thoroughly trained and well educated in the evaluation and treatment of dermatological conditions. They are very capable of treating patients with the type of conditions you described above. Dr. Beals also oversees all of his patients' plan of care, treatments and performs all complex procedures in our clinic. This is standard protocol in the dermatological field. You may request to see Dr. Beals in addition to our other providers at any time during your visit in the future, if that is your preference.

name: barbara wilson
text: Your face is truly your passport to the world.  It’s one of the first thing people see.  For that reason,  Dermatology and Laser of Alabama is my only trusted choice when it comes to achieving radiantly glowing skin.  Dr. Sarah Sawyer provides exceptional dermatological care, with her large arsenal of lasers that helps to with your derma-logical needs.  After a consultation with her, I chose the six months VIP Program to address my hyperpigmentation issues.  Nadia, an esthetician at DLA, put me at ease  when I decided to get the Clear and Brilliant procedure.  She verbally walk me through the procedure and told me to expect.  Her knowledge and skills of the fraxel laser for my skin type made my appointment successful.  What I love the most about DLA is that there is NEVER any hard sell to purchase unnecessary products. Nadia only suggested products to help me bring to healthy glowing skin to fruition.  And everyone is professional!  Thank you Dr. Sawyer and Nadia for my gorgeous glow up!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing this wonderful review with us, Barbara! It's an honor to have your recommendation. We only want the best for our patients, which means investing in the top laser treatments in Birmingham. We'll be sure to pass on your compliments to Nadia and Dr. Sawyer!

name: Cat Williams
text: Dr. Sawyer and her wonderful team are simply the best.  I live between NYC, Los Angeles, and Nashville and I TRAVEL to see Dr. Sawyer. She is that good.  And also she is an absolutely delightful person (I can same the same for her staff).  She is the only doctor I trust with my cosmetic procedures. I have been seeing her for years.  I have Botox (actually Dysport) with her and I always look refreshed, never ever frozen.  I have had Juvederm filler, IPL laser, Ulthera, and Profound.  All have been a great success with Dr. Sawyer.  She is a down to earth physician, incredibly well trained and skilled, and very honest. My results are very natural.  If you don't need it, she will not push you into it. In fact, I have asked her about a few procedures and she simply said, "No, you don't need to spend the money to do that."  I know she has the very best interests at heart for her patients which is why she is so popular. I cannot say enough about Dr. Sawyer and her staff.  I will be a patient as long as she is in practice.

resp.text: Cat, thank you so much for taking the time to share this kind review. We so appreciate you making the drive and trusting us with your care. It's our pleasure. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

I will definitely be back.

name: Cameron Callis
text:
I've been working with Margo Maples, PA for months now on my acne and acne scaring, and she has me on a great skincare routine, and I'm seeing noticeable changes in my skin, which is awesome! Margo has done two chemical peels to treat my acne and laser treatments to remove acne scaring on my face, and she is fantastic! She is very detailed, and great and explaining everything to me, which as a patient, is something I appreciate. The office is super nice, and the staff members are very helpful, and they offer excellent customer service! Thanks again Margo, I cannot wait to see how my face looks after this recent chemical peel! If you're looking for a dermatology office, Dermatology & Laser of Alabama is a fantastic office!
-Cam

resp.text: Cam, thank you so much for this kind review. We are so excited for your progress. Margo is always careful to take her time with patients, and we look forward to seeing you again!

text: The office definitely has a bit of a startling, stark, 'Men in Black' vibe to it, but all of the staff are very warm-natured people in my experience! I bought one product that I had already been using, and it was a bit pricey compared to online so I probably won't do that again, but I care much more about how the staff treats me than that -- and they were great!

name: Patricia Donahue
text:
It is a six hour round trip for me to see Dr. Sawyer and her staff.  I have been coming for several years, usually once every quarter. My sister and two of my friends  go as well.  It has turned out to be our Girls Day Out.  I have been to other dermatologists and have had a variety of procedures.    I chose to drive to Birmingham to DLA for these reasons:  1.  Dr. Sawyer has the vision of an artist.  She makes sure that I am the best, most natural looking me. (She by the way is ageless. She definitely practices what she preaches.)  2.  Her Staff is amazing.  They are beautiful inside and out.  They really care about their patients.  3.  Dr. Sawyer stays current and invests in all the latest technological innovations. I recently had the Quadralase Laser Procedure.  I am super pleased by the results.
I highly recommend DLA.

resp.text: Patricia, thank you so much for sharing! We so appreciate you making the drive and trusting us with your care. We always look forward to visiting and wish you all the happiest of holidays!

name: DD S
text: I have been a patient of Dr. Sawyer for about 3 years now. I would not recommend this clinic to anyone. I had tried contacting the office for a week to have a prescription filled with no response. My pharmacy called and told me they too could not get a response from the clinic either. I emailed yesterday to state how ridiculous I thought it was for there to be this little communication with patients, especially ones that need a prescription refilled. To my disbelief I received a personal phone call from Dr. Sawyer herself on a Saturday at 3:00 only to call me out for the email I sent, because the email I sent said “ridiculous” in it. She called me rude many times and then stated i would no longer be a patient of DLA. Dr Sawyer then went on to tell me that the entire DLA staff had, had  many negative discussions about me in the past. I have been left confused, as when I asked for how I have ever been rude to anyone at DLA she hung up on me. I can assure you, that this was a mistake on the entire DLA staff and Dr. Sawyer, as she spoke to me as I was a completely different person then who she thought she was speaking too. After that very disturbing and unprofessional phone call, I am thankful to move to a different clinic. I can not fathom a physician directly calling and speaking to a patient in the manner Dr. Sawyer did, and going out of her way to do so on a Saturday afternoon just to tell me all this and without verifying my information before being aggressive towards me. She definitely was mistaken on who I was, but I will never return.

name: K P
text: These folks are great!! I went in for a tattoo removal consult and worked with Christie the laser tech.  She was WONDERFUL and informed me that the color of my tattoo on my complexion (green on mixed skin) would be difficult to get out and would essentially also take out my natural pigment. She was upfront and told me that it would likely not give me the results I was looking for (apparently red / black are pretty easy to get out but green / purple is more difficult). She saved me multiple sessions at $150/pop and a potentially worse situation than I am already in if all of the pigment was removed (leaving a totally white version of the tattoo).  I really appreciate that kind of honesty  - especially when I was walking in with no real knowledge of the laser removal process and money in hand.  I really respect them for this business practice.  PLUS all the girls in the office are so sweet, especially Christina at the front desk. She was attentive and professional during the check-in / check-out process and created such a comfortable and pleasant environment. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM!

resp.text: Thank you, Katherine, for your review, and for letting us participate in your care.

name: Teresa Pennington
text: Was going to Dr want for both 2 years or so. I could tell he wasn't a good Dr an never looks at you ..i have phyorisis .An a foundation help provide my shots of sterala they mailed it every 3 months an i just went in an his nurse would give it to me .i.it was doing me good. When time for shot only had tiny spot on my ankle or so still 90 percent clear. He only charged me 35 to 40 bucks reason I went to him other are high .he never really seen how much I had on my body only my back or leg arm ..but .Bout 2 years ago when the Foundation told me I can now get it from the pharmacy an give it to myself .he didn't want to fill out the paper to it both the shot. An took me off of the sterala wanted to put me in remagade . an knew I didn't have insurance it was going cost both 300 for them to check see if I can do it an was going have lay there 3 hrs for them to put needle in arm .It's crazy I told him he knows I can't afford it ..that I wanted to stay on sterlara he said he wasn't working that he trying something else told him it was helping an keep me clear ..he knew he would my more money only every 6 months .i asked him ..if he can tell me an tell me how much I have on my body ..he couldn't. He left out of the room .an I haven't went back now it covers 90 percent of it now .because others doctor so high for office visit. An i have start over of paper work . but now fix be 65 an got insurance now I never go back .he not a good doctor .best Dr ever was James krell in Birmingham

name: Justice Writer
text:
Medical offices like those of Lon F. Raby Jr., located at 4021 Balmoral Dr. S.W. Huntsville, Alabama, are offices that give the South a bad name besides some of the Southerner’s unmerited allegiance with the Confederate flag that should remain forever buried. His office is indeed rude, nasty, racist and lack any reminisce to GOD. On top of that, Lon F. Raby Jr., and his office staff members are apparently not only hate criminals; but do not want certain groups of people to be allowed in his practice although by law he has little choice on the admittance of certain groups of people. He and his staff are unkempt, unintelligent and just plain ridiculous.

Not only that, but he is too busy poking his nose in matters that don’t concern him such as listening to lies his staff overpowers him with to see the light of day. His staff sits around gossiping, lying and hating all day. Although there are several of them conversing all at once, when a patient approaches the desk, they ignore them as though the patient is invisible. They all give a new meaning to the words nasty, mean, unintelligent and smelly.  Like Hugo Black a now deceased United States Supreme Court Justice, Lon F. Raby Jr., and most of his staff members including Mike Lee, Shelia, Megan and especially Ashley are likely affiliated with the k.k.k. Unlike Justice Black, however, Lon F. Raby Jr., and his staff don’t even try to hide their hate for some and act as though the mere entrance into their office is a privilege that non-Caucasians should not be able to obtain.

Besides that, Lon F. Raby Jr., is not a good doctor at all. He is uncaring, misinformed, rude and has the bed-side manner of a door-knob. He couldn’t even remember one of his patients who at the age of 15, had cancer, claiming he has 35k patients. Regardless, a doctor who really cared, would forget such a young cancer patient. Right?

He apparently does not keep up with the latest medical advances and he seemingly knows very little about his profession. For example, he constantly misdiagnosed two of his patients and he makes health statements that are often without merit just like his nurse Shelia who had the uneducated audacity to say, “… Blacks don’t wash their hair everyday…”. What a terrible untruth to say and what a terrible poor excuse for a so-called medical office.  We wouldn't go back if they paid us good money. Don’t waste your time, money or energy with these Billies of the hills.

name: Derek Robertson
text: Wow "Justice Writer" how in the world did you come to all of those opinions and observations in just one appointment?   Who has that kind of time to conduct such an in depth study? I am impressed by your analysis. In fact, I am impressed you were able to have ascertained all that information in just one office visit. You really should seek employment with the CIA or NSA, they could use your analytical skills. However, I really do tend to think your opinion was based on several visits. But then why would you continue going back to such a terrible office after all those horrible experiences? There are plenty of Dermatology offices in this area and you could easily have become a new patient else where. But for some reason you didn't. So either you are that analytical whereby you were able to ascertain all those opinions in a short office visit or you just continued to endure these office visits and made your opinions after such. But you know what I really think and what your opinion and post communicates? You didn't get something for free or you didn't get it your way and expected rules and processes to be broken for your convenience and thereby you painted "everyone" that works in this office with a broad brush as being a racist. Which by the way is the common sounding bell heard throughout or nation nowadays when someone doesn't get there way and wants the rules broken for them. My advice to you is to be careful when posting in the future and accusing them of being associated with such hate groups of the KKK. You never know who you offended. It could be someone's dear wife you painted with your immature and spoiled brush. And that my dear or sir can be construed as slander and a civil matter that could cost you plenty. And by the way if you think I have a dog in the fight with this office you are sadly mistaken. It is your uneducated and offensive language that got my attention.  I recommend you begin expecting to play by the rules like everyone else and leave skin color and hate groups out of it. And if there is something you can't have or you desire to have then figure it out how to obtain it and not hold your hand out. By the way, how dare you call out folks in the name of God!  Can you please show me the scripture where a person can associate those that do not hand over what one demands with a hate group?  You might want to turn the flap of your bible to the left a little more often. Maybe then you will learn what God expects of us.

name: Jessica Marshall
text: Fantastic!! I took my 16 month old here and the staff was incredibly polite, sweet and very understanding of small children. My toddler and I were called back right on time, which is such a blessing when you're wrestling with a tiny person to sit still in the waiting area. We only waited 1 minute before Melissa William's came in. Melissa William's was amazing and she was able to keep the visit very quick but it didnt feel rushed at all. I felt like she fully addressed the issue and sent us on our way in a very timely manner. Again, very important with a 16 month old and I'm sure very important to someone who has to return to work. I will be returning here and will highly recommend! ! The only issue I had was that there was no fold down changing station.

name: Mary-Katherine
text: Very unhappy with my experience and will never go back. On my first visit the doctor seemed very rushed. He did not ask a single question. He prescribed a lotion that caused a reaction. While I do not blame them for the reaction, the way it was handled once the rash breakout occurred was ridiculously. It took 7 hours for a nurse to call me back. During this time, they did not have a time available for me to come in despite the reaction continuously spreading. Once I finally received a call back they felt no need for me to come in despite my concern. The solution was to put some cortizone you can get at any drug store. They also stated the bumps I incurred probably wouldn’t clear up completely. The rash like breakout was extremely concerning and it is troubling they would not be concerned with a breakout they caused. The fact the solution wouldn’t completely resolve the issue caused by their prescription is unacceptable. It appears they are more concerned with the volume of patients then the actual treatment of their patients.

name: Victoria Godwin

text: Dr. Hartman, his team and the products and services he offers, gets 5 stars from me. I was referred to this practice via a friend who was having issues with pigmentation and after seeing the results he experienced I scheduled an appointment. I am mainly concerned about wholistic skin health and anti-aging. I am quite astounded by the change I have seen. I am a patient for life.

Great responsiveness, professional atmosphere, and hands down the best! My husband and I have been patients for several years and have also taken both of my children for appointments, and we have all had great customer service from the beginning. Definitely gets a high recommendation from our whole family!

text: Black owned business with the best Doctors and nurse practitioners. Very organized with multiple locations, with extremely friendly and helpful staff. Their locations are extremely clean and have such pleasant environments. They always give back to the community, and often host special events for their clients or host fundraisers as well. Very thorough and knowledgeable, usually treating/curing quickly, without repeated visits (unlike most Dr offices these days). Our family is very satisfied and will continue to recommend their services.

name: Adriane Andrews
text:
This staff literally wrote a false review using my name. I wonder how many others there are. Wow, I’m so appalled. I have received the best treatment ever from Dr. Youhn, but Dr. Hartman only cares about money not his patients. I tried very hard to keep a positive relationship with this practice, but they refused to uphold excellent customer service.

Best

resp.text: We care about our patients. Not money. But when people receive treatments and leave without paying, yes we try to collect payment and call the police.

name: Macamillion528hz Stinson
text: I've been to a number of dermatologists over my lifetime, but Dr. Hartman is hands down the best of the best. He is extremely thorough and spends time addressing all my concerns. His staff is knowledgeable, accommodating and efficient. He is a professional in every sense of the word and I would recommend him to anyone looking for dermatological services.

name: J Ebbert
text: Amazing experience. I was in and out of the office in 20 minutes!  It's usually near impossible to get a dermatologist appointment that's within a month of when you're calling (especially to an office you've never been to) but I called Monday and they got me in on Tuesday! Dr. Youhn and Christa were amazing. She was so friendly and made the whole experience enjoyable and painless! She has resorted so much more confidence in myself from getting rid of a beauty mark I had ever since I was a kid. I highly recommend this place!!!

name: Larry Roberts (Pastor)
text: Dr. Curl and others have always been very good to me. Love them all.

name: Darla Watson
text: The girls in the office and all of the doctors and nurse practitioners have always been super sweet and kind to us whenever we visit. I’m so happy to have these services in Chelsea. They even provide laser options and spa procedures. The best!

name: Lindsay Hamner
text: I had a great experience here. The staff is incredibly friendly, the facility is stylish and still welcoming, and Dr. Youhn is a wonderful doctor. She's very knowledgeable​ and addressed my concerns quickly. She even found a few things I missed that needed to be addressed. I would highly recommend her and the Skin Wellness Center for anyone looking for a dermatologist in the area.

name: Victoria Bailey
text: Outstanding service and staff. I felt that my needs and concerns were heard. I will definitely be returning

name: Cindy Merriwether
text: Dr Hartman explains exactly what is wrong and how we are going to treat it. I sincerely trust him, his medical knowledge and his judgment. The entire staff is friendly and makes you feel at ease even through some not-so-easy time.

name: Nikasha Thomas
text: Dr. Corey Hartman and his staff provides great professional service. Autism sensory friendly. Thank you for making my son comfortable and providing excellent care of his skincare needs 😊.

name: Sheila Jackson
text: Skin Wellness has exceeded my expectations.  No longer do I have to leave Chelsea for dermatology care only to be overcharged and belittled at other places.  Everyone here from the receptionist to the doctors are friendly, kind and really do care about me and my skin.  The new office is beautiful and impeccably clean.  I have been a patient at the Homewood office, but now I don't have to fight the traffic to get the best care in the Birmingham area.  I love this place and will continue to spread the word in Chelsea and beyond.

name: Nazaren “N Mindi” Mindingall
text: I’m always impressed with the efficiency and professionalism of the staff and the medical care I receive from Dr. Hartman. It’s second to none. I will continue to refer all of my friends and family.

name: Elizabeth Golden
text: Always excellent. I’m proud to be a patient.

name: L M
text: I took my daughter here for acne & the dr's wouldn't even consider topical treatments they only would do ACCUTANE which has alot of side effects & should be a last resort instead of the only way to treat mild acne. They also prescribed antibiotics & when I asked to get the prescription they said they send all prescriptions to Texas & have tgem shipped to the patient?! Its been 6 mo & still havent seen tge antibiotics from Texas. Never would I recommend skin wellness center to anyone

name: Haley Isbell
text: The entire staff’s professional and the excellent care I received will be the reason I go back as well as refer anyone looking for a dermatologist in Birmingham area. Everyone in my family has seen a doctor at Skin Wellness and we are thankful for their care.

text: Dr Hartman & Dr Yang are the best ! They're both are terrific Doctors.

resp.text: We love you back, Lori!!

name: Alicia Kenerley
text: Whoever answered the phone had ZERO services that they offer, like she just doesn't care at all about her job nor me a potential cash cow of a customer. So, never mind.

resp.text: I’d like the record to show that this review was written at 2:42 in the morning by a person who has never visited our office. Also, in my 16 year experience, someone who was serious about skin care and procedures would not mind paying the $100 consultation fee to come into the office to discuss these things like an adult.

name: Brannigan Keller
text:
Edited from a 1 star to a 5 star

My 2 year old child was a new patient and one of his siblings got sick the day of the appointment. I called to try to reschedule and was informed that I would be charged a no show fee. I do not think they could have made me pay the $50 no show fee as I had never been to this business before and more importantly was not aware of this ridiculous amount but called my spouse to make arrangements to go.  Needless to say they lost mine and my families business, I would not recommend them to anyone as my experience is not how to treat customers.

I’ve changed my negative review to a positive one after receiving a phone call from the owner of this practice.  It’s nice that he took the time to call and listen to my concerns while making attempts to set things right. I understand why these “no show” policies have to be in place as I work in the healthcare field as well.  After talking to the owner I would recommend this business.

resp.text: Ms. Keller, Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We apologize that this was your experience. Charging for missed appointments due to illness is not and has never been our policy. Again, we apologize.

name: Doug Merkel
text: Always nice. Front desk back. We do not wait long to be seen. Good location for us.

name: Trina Janay
text: Saw Dr. Rayna Dyck(she was recommended by some people i know personally). & she was horrible. She first off camebin very dry which is a horrible first impression and my attitude immediately was based off of hers and by her attitude being so dry (seemed like she really didn’t want to be at work) it made me not believe anything she said or that she didn’t care to help ...although everything she said might have been true. Her staff though is very sweet. I didn’t get the medication she thought MIGHT help b/c it was pointless to purchase out of pocket if it MIGHT help. And the two reasons she said i might have skin discoloration was definitely not my case. I’m big on reviews & she had a few reviews on her dry attitude but i gave her the benefit of the doubt because i had people who recommended her..obviously b/c she helped their condition & not off her attitude. She was so awkward & dry. Def. appreciate Dr. Hartman for giving me a call about my visit and hopefully i dont have to pay another co-pay when i fu with him b/c today i def. paid a co-pay for no reason at all. and the stars are for the staff and him calling me back def. not for Dr. Dyck.

name: Gillian McCown
text:
Dr. Youhn had the nerve and audacity to tell me that I should wean my son. Last I checked, breastfeeding is outside her scope of practice and she has no business giving professional advice about childcare or breastfeeding to a patient. It is unethical to give advice or direction on any topic professionally outside one’s scope. Breastfeeding and the health and wellness of my son most definitely are.

Updated because they decided to be unprofessional with their response here and on Facebook.

These comments started when I was asked if he was my only one and if I was thinking about having more yet and I said I'm still not sleeping so no. She kept saying should really talk to his ped because he doesn't need to be nursing all night long. At his size he doesn't need to eat at night and he's probably just doing it out of comfort. I didn't ask for sleep advice.
I mean I could understand her saying the nursing could be irritating my issue and that weaning might be something to consider.
But talking about how my son doesn't need to nurse anymore and I should really just talk to his pediatrician about weaning him is way beyond her scope and none of her damn business!
His pediatrician has no problem with it and nursing till 2 is recommended by the WHO.

name: Gina Delbianco
text: The Chelsea office is aweful. I've been taking my daughter's here for skin care for a long time now...mostly because we live in Chelsea and it's convenient. I've decided I've had enough of their extremely snooty, unfriendly staff. We had been seeing Dr. Murphy in this office for years and then one day she just  magically dissapears and is replaced by a different dermatologist with no explanation. Nothing!  Can't stand this office!!  We wiill be moving on to a new dermatologist and hopefully a smiling, friendly and much more upbeat atmosphere!   Alert people! Five minutes after posting this review My phone rings and this man states is name is Dr. Hartman ..and demands to know my reasonings for posting this review! This is just too unreal for me! Skin wellness of Chelsea ...you are sketchy!!!!!!  Ok so now I'm getting harrassing messages from two different area codes regarding this review. I guess Skin wellness pays some crappy people to harrass people that give bad reviews in hopes they will erase it. Not going to happen. You're Chelsea office sucks!....Excuse me! Whoever you are..her name was Brittany and she treated my children's skin problems for years. And please . ..stop texting your profane messsges to my phone!

resp.text: We pride ourselves on being friendly and helpful. We have never employed a doctor named Murphy. Good luck achieving your skin care goals.

name: Sarah Holder
text: Fantastic staff and exceptional providers. The whole team goes above and beyond for their patients!

name: Lillian Byner
text: In response to Dr. Hartman's reply to my review, I appreciate your telephone call. However, as I communicated to you in our conversation last night which you neglected to include in your response, I have waited for a return call to my non-urgent issue way longer than 24-48 hours. My first follow-up appointment where the biopsy was taken was on June 13th, where I was told by a clinician that I would know the results before I left for vacation. I called for results initially 1 or 2 days before I left town June 23rd. I then called back on the 28th, where I was told once again that I would be called back before close of business, yet I was not. I was never informed by any of your staff that I spoke with (both clinical and non-clinical - I have spoken with both) of the 10-14 day timeframe for biopsy results. In speaking with you last night is the first I have heard of the 10-14 day waiting period for results and the results not being discussed until the scheduled follow-up visit. Perhaps some form of training refresher would be useful in ensuring that all of the staff, both clinical and non-clinical are relaying uniform information and setting the proper expectations to the patients. Once again, I appreciate your reaching out to me and I am sorry that I had a less than desirable experience.

text: We have been going to Dr. Stanford for years and have always appreciated his friendliness, thoroughness and more of an “old school” approach to medicine. We are not interested in the “cosmetic” end of dermatology. I actually just referred a colleague to Dr. Stanford today for that reason.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this positive review! Have a great day!

text: Dr. Stanford is my favorite dermatologist by far.  Been going to him since we moved to Alabama in 2001 and have referred several of my friends to him (who feel the same way). resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this positive review! Have a great day!

text: He and his nurse are always very thorough and friendly. They both make it very comfortable (as much as you can with all the awful freezing) I have been seeing him for a few years and I will continue as I enjoy the very professional atmosphere and helpful people there.

text: Staff are friendly and they always make me feel comfortable. I value the expertise, advise, and they are good listeners.

text: Came in early by mistake and was taken care of right away. Dr Standford is enjoyable to be around. Very friendly, nice humor and professional. Office was clean, Staff friendly.

Everyone was so friendly and efficient and i was in and out in a timely manner.

text: Dr. Stanford is great...professional, communicative, and supportive. I recommend him frequently.

name: Tommy Turk
text: I have been using Dr. Stanford for several years. He is a very thorough doctor and I have been pleased with every procedure that he has done on me. He is a no nonsense kind of guy and let's you know exactly what needs to be done to treat you. I highly recommend him.

name: Bo Benedict
text:
Hey Bo............I tried to give you and Christie 10 stars, but the option was not available. Y'all did a great job and I have not experienced a second of pain or discomfort since I left your office..........although I know it is coming. The most pain I have experienced with Advanced Dermatology was trying to deal with your phone answering system on the way to the appointment when we thought we were lost. Y'all need to make it more patient friendly, or better still, get rid of it.............nobody likes dealing with phone answering machines, not even you.
Thanks for a job well done and you and Christie are the best...........and I love Christie.
P.S. Tell Dr. Tommy I am waiting for an invitation to visit his Hunting Place up in north Baldwin...........
Thanks again............Bo Benedict

Diane Walker

text: Every dermatologist I saw before going to Sunrise Dermatology helped me to recover from constant, aggressive eczema flare-ups, but Dr. Ramagosa focused on ways I could prevent them from happening in the first place! Between him and the doctors at the Daphne location, I've been consistently trying the newest medications that make my conditions manageable. I went from missing school because of the severity of my eczema to having minor patches that don't bother me much. I owe so much to the staff at Sunrise Dermatology, and I really can't recommend them enough.

name: The Woke Unicorn
text:
I am relatively new to the area and had yet to establish a local dermatologist. I am unbelievably relieved to have found such a dedicated and knowledgeable dermatologist in Dr. Ramagosa, currently serving the Mobile area.

Over the past year and a half, I developed some type of acne/cyst/nodular skin issue. The complexities of this concern are daunting, but let’s just say I had visited quite a few dermatologists between Birmingham and Mobile, with no relief. Honestly, I had almost given up all hope of finding a resolution.

I was referred to Dr. Ramagosa via my newly acquired primary care physician (who is also amazing) through Alabama Medical Group.
From the moment I entered the Sunrise Dermatology office building, I knew I was in good hands. The interior is beautifully decorated and tastefully modern. The attention to detail, in presentation and delivery, alerted me to the fact that these doctors understood the significance of aesthetics and the finesse required of them in their field.

In dealing with concerns like mine (those concerns clearly visible, mainly located on my face) it is important to me that the doctor not only address the immediate issue, but that he understands the end goal and formulates a plan with this outcome in mind.

Shortly after I explained some medical background regarding my skin, Dr. Ramagosa confidently assured me that he could help. He explained what he believed to be the case, discussed why this problem probably presented, and how we could rectify the situation.

I just left my one month follow up with Dr. Ramagosa and I must say that the results thus far have been amazing, and I finally see the proverbial light at the end of the tunnel.

I am very thankful for the referral to Sunrise Dermatology, and appreciate Dr. Ramagosa and his staff.

Go here!!! ❤️🦄

text: He is a great doctor.

name: Kim Sirmans
text: I went to Dr. Stewart in desperation after going to another dermatology clinic for several months trying to help my daughter with a horrible problem on her foot. We first went in for her bc she had one plantar wart on her foot. They cut it open (to do the nitrogen freeze treatment) but then it just spread like wildfire. We went to this  dermatology office several times over several months and the problem just continued to get worse. I kept doing exactly what they said to do  (religiously, every day, and very carefully) and it wasn’t helping. So I called Dr. Stewart’s office and explained our situation. He said it was the worst case he’d seen in a child and gave us our options. He told us he could laser them off that very day and she could leave his office that day without any more warts on her foot. This option was never given to us at the other office (probably bc we never got to see the actual derm- we always saw the nurse practitioner and i don’t know if they are able to do the laser). Anyway, my daughter was so scared but his staff were all so kind and wonderful and helped her so much to be brave and feel comfortable. Dr. Stewart then did as promised and gave us good instructions on what we needed to do to care for it after we left. After that he followed up with me from his personal cell phone several times to make sure she was doing ok and to guide me through caring for her. He did a fantastic job and she no longer has to deal with the pain or embarrassment bc of him and his giving us other options than we’d been given before. It was clear that he really cared and was so thoughtful and kind to us. He is a great doctor- we are lucky to have him one Auburn/ Opelika!

They perform mohs surgery in the Gadsden office as well as in their Birmingham ( Liberty Park ) office..and that office is the lap of luxury.  Recently had a mohs surgery performed and  I have never been treated better..here with Dr. Bezeral and in Their Liberty park office with Dr. Homan..He is the owner of several of these centers throughout Alabama..
This is a Christian organization and they act like it!!

text: Professional, courteous, and timely. I am exceedingly pleased with my interactions at this office. I never had a “wait,” as the intake nurse handed me off directly to the PA, who then handed me off to the doctor and a med student while she stayed and they all discussed there with me. I received two quick biopsies and an order for a face cream... which they actually had on site for like 30 bucks. I’ll be back here with any future skin concerns or cosmetic needs.

name: Katie Hart
text: Dr. Ginsburg removed a squamous cell cancer from the lower right side of my face a week ago.  It was the best experience I have ever had in a doctor's office.  There was no waiting; all of the employees were super nice and did everything they could to make me comfortable; the office is the cleanest place I have ever been in and there is a calming slow-paced atmosphere in the office.  However, the best thing about this experience is that Dr. Ginsburg did a super job of removing the cancer without creating a scar--this looks better than the last squamous cell cancer I had removed by a plastic surgeon.  The whole procedure was done in the office.  I could not be more pleased.  Dr. Ginsburg will be my dermatologist as long as he is available.

name: Mickie Harris
text: No matter what your skin issue, Dr. Ginsburg and his amazing team are eager to listen to you to find a resolution that fits your needs and budget.  Dr. Ginsburg takes his time and doesn’t make you feel rushed.  He does not frivolously recommend treatments or procedures. On my most recent visit, he actually “lost” money.  I was going to get a chemical peel and he told me that I didn’t have enough skin discoloration to warrant one.  How about that?  I appreciate that he is candid and tells you what you don’t need, but can also make recommendations for other available and beneficial skin treatment options.  I just want to age gracefully - but with the professional guidance and assistance from Dr. Ginsburg.

name: Christina Conklin
text: There are no words to express how amazing Dr. Ginsburg is! Last year I went to a plastic surgeon for a consult for chin and neck lipo and had a horrible experience and it scared me away from procedure. My mom recommended I go see Dr Ginsburg since he did her Lazer lipo on her legs years ago. During my consult he made me feel super confident in my decision to move forward with procedure and I knew I was in good hands. I had my procedure in April  I'm in shock at already how amazing I look. I have the jaw line I've always dreamed of! Dr. Ginsburg has personally called and checked on me 4 times since my procedure and I've never had such a personable experience from a doctor! He  doesn't know it but he has changed my life!
